price: 278. O jūs, kurie tikite! Bijokite Allaho ir atsisakykite to, kas lieka (mokėtina jums) iš Riba (palūkanų) (nuo dabar į ateitį), jei jūs esate (tikri) tikintieji.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَذَرُواْ مَا بَقِيَ مِنَ ٱلرِّبَوٰٓاْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wadharū mā baqiya mina al-riba in kuntum mu'minīna
